comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: Corner of Pitt and Markets Streets, photo is looking north along Pitt Street. Centrepoint (Westfields) shopping complex stands there today. Sydney's only set of turntable extension ladders in operation.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/page/6005426 per the T&CJ note I'd say the photographer was G.A. Hills...the SLNSW collection includes a number of pics taken by Hills.
